title.narrative: Call to Action 3 – Conference on AMR mitigation in LIMCs

description.narrative:
To support the design and facilitation a three-day conference, Call to Action 3, on AMR mitigation in LIMCs, gathering support for the global AMR-agenda in a post-COVID.19 world and spur implementation of national actions plans in LIMCs.
This grant will enable the Wellcome Trust to design and efficient virtual AMR conference, reinvigorating collective AMR efforts in the post-COVID-19 world and promoting the implementation of national action plans for combating antimicrobial resistance in developing countries. The conference is co-hosted by ICARS, Denmark and Ghana, while the World Bank, UN Foundation and UNICEF are important contributors to the agenda. The conference will consist of various sessions with a cross-sectoral perspective om AMR mitigation with speakers from governments, civil society, professionals, academia and private sector in particularly from LMICs.
